attributes.action: Have a binding Remain or No Deal referendum alongside a general election
attributes.additional_details: How can it be undemocratic to now seek a binding mandate?  So please sign this petition seeking a binding referendum on Remain or No Deal – we know what both look like now.  If we are to have a general election, then there is no excuse not to ask this discrete question alongside the general vote.
attributes.background: Whatever our current PM might say, he does not have a mandate.  There was no clear majority at the last general election, the referendum was advisory only and nobody knew what leave might actually mean.
